name: release-action
description: GitHub Action used to generate change logs during SDK release.
author: Serhii Mamontov <sergey@pubnub.com>

scripts.build:installers-unity: ncc build src/installers/install-unity.ts -o dist/installers/unity && mv dist/installers/unity/index.js dist/installers/unity/main.js && ncc build src/services/unity/deactivate.ts -o dist/installers/unity && mv dist/installers/unity/index.js dist/installers/unity/post.js
scripts.build:service-s3: ncc build src/services/aws/s3.ts -o dist/services/aws && mv dist/services/aws/index.js dist/services/aws/s3.js
scripts.build:service-github-pages: ncc build src/services/github/pages.ts -o dist/services/github && mv dist/services/github/index.js dist/services/github/pages.js
scripts.build:service-github-release: ncc build src/services/github/release.ts -o dist/services/github && mv dist/services/github/index.js dist/services/github/release.js
scripts.build:service-helpers: ncc build src/services/service-failure.ts -o dist/services/helpers && mv dist/services/helpers/index.js dist/services/helpers/service-failure.js
scripts.build:services: npm-run-all --serial build:service-helpers build:service-s3 build:service-cocoapods build:service-composer build:service-github-pages build:service-github-release build:service-maven build:service-npm build:service-pub build:service-pypi build:service-rubygems
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build:services && npm test
